question: Which of the following started the socio-religious organization “Tattvabodhini Sabha” and its appended journal ‘Tattvabodhini’?
explanation: Devendranath Tagore started the socio-religious organization ‘Tattvabodhini Sabha’ and its appended journal ‘Tattvabodhini.’ The objectives of Tattvabodhini Sabha were to encourage religious inquiries and disseminate the essence of Upanishads.
